title: Augments.
body: Question. Not necessarily sure, but when you unlock all 3 of the icons for 750ip, are you supposed to receive 7 PROJECT Cores in total as well to be able to obtain/acquire an icon blueprint to be permanent? Alas, I only received 5; is my luck just that unlucky ? (';8       {{champion:32}}

replies.body: Opening the icon caches will provide one project core each.  You'll be able to unlock a total of 10 through the icon chests once the upcoming disruption cache becomes available.  Additional cores can be found through augment caches.  More details are also available in our[ project disruption ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ)guide.  I hope that helps clear things up!

> You'll be able to unlock a total of 10 through the icon chests once the upcoming disruption cache becomes available. 

Hum, it was supposed 12, last we were told about it? Especially since 11 are needed for the random Project Skin Blueprint?

5 is normal.  one for each champion's 750 IP caches and then 2 more from the augment cache that you craft from the fragments you got from all 3 of the champion's cashes.

I suspect that they made it so that you have to get mroe in order to craft the icon blueprints. at the same time though you do get a random guaranteed skin shard and a random loot shard from augment cashes, which you got from IP that you normally would not be able to get, so it's a decent deal and IP sink to spend extra IP in for a chance to get skin shards and potential permanent skins. sounds good to me IMO.
